message.content:
{"id": "102516", 
"title": "Bug 102516 JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand", 
"description": "Bug 102516 JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.", 
"OB": "The JDBC Data Set Editor page currently loads all tables and columns in the data source immediately. This can cause performance issues and slow down the page loading time, especially if the data source has a large number of tables and columns.", 
"EB": "The JDBC Data Set Editor page should only load tables and columns in the data source when the user expands the tree or applies a filter. This will improve performance and optimize the page loading time.", 
"SR": "Ensure that the JDBC Data Set Editor page loads tables and columns on demand, rather than loading everything immediately when the page is opened."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '102516', 'title': 'Bug 102516JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand', 'description': 'Bug 102516JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists thetables and columns in your data source. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Could the load of the tree bedeferred until the user expands the tree or applys a filter? ', 'SR': ''}
